summary.span: 表示所有 控件的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class for all controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理在 用户单击时响应的事件 。Handle the event to respond when the user clicks a . 用户可以 通过使用 或在控件具有焦点时按 enter 键或空格键来引发事件。The user can raise the event by using an or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus. 当用户按空格键时，控件将设置 为 `true` 并捕获鼠标。When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets to `true` and captures the mouse. 因此，控件将引发鼠标事件，例如 和 。As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as and . 请注意，使用 或 ENTER 不会更改 或捕获鼠标，但会引发 事件。Note that using the or ENTER does not change or capture the mouse, but it does raise the event. 将 附加属性设置为 `true` 。The sets the attached property to `true`. 将 属性设置为 `false`。The sets the property to `false`. 是 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的单个对象 (例如字符串、图像或面板) 。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As RoutedEventHandler

summary.span: 在单击 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以 通过使用 或在控件具有焦点时按 enter 键或空格键来引发事件。The user can raise the event by using an or by pressing ENTER or the SPACEBAR when the control has focus. 当用户按空格键时，控件将设置 为 `true` 并捕获鼠标。When the user presses the SPACEBAR, the control sets to `true` and captures the mouse. 因此，控件将引发鼠标事件，例如 和 。As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as and . 请注意，使用 或 ENTER 不会更改 或捕获鼠标，但会引发 事件。Note that using the or ENTER does not change or capture the mouse, but it does raise the event. 在 方法中将事件标记为已处理 并引发 事件。The marks the event as handled in the method and raises the event. 因此， 对于从继承的控件，该事件永远不会发生 。Hence, the event will never occur for a control that inherits from . 改为将事件处理程序附加到 事件，或将 `handledEventsToo` 设置为时调用 `true` 。Instead, attach an event handler to the event, or call with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示三个按三种不同方式响应单击的按钮。The following example shows three buttons that respond to clicks in three different ways. - 悬停-当用户将鼠标悬停在按钮上时，第一个按钮更改颜色Hover - the first button changes colors when the user hovers with the mouse over the button - 按下-第二个按钮要求在鼠标指针位于按钮上时按下鼠标。Press - the second button requires that the mouse be pressed while the mouse pointer is in the button. - Release-第三方不会重置按钮的背景色，直到在按钮中按下并释放鼠标。Release - the third does not reset the background color of the buttons until the mouse is pressed and released in the button. [!code-xaml[ClickModes_snip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClickModes_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ClickModes_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClickModes_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ClickModes_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClickModes_snip/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在按下按钮时调用的命令。

value.span: 当按此按钮时要调用的命令。

span.span: A command to invoke when this button is pressed.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于将命令与特定的按钮实例相关联。This property is used to associate a command with a particular button instance. 在中 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，此属性最常设置为一个现有命令库（如或）中的静态命令值 。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property is most often set to be a static command value from one of the existing command libraries, such as or . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [命令概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview) 或 。For details, see [Commanding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview) or . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *commandName**commandName* 按下此按钮时要调用的命令。The command to invoke when this button is pressed. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ CommandParameter { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.CommandParameter : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要传递给 属性的参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the parameter to pass to the property.

value.span: 要传递给 属性的参数。

span.span: Parameter to pass to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命令库中的大多数现有命令不使用命令参数。Most existing commands from the command libraries do not use a command parameter. 在使用 command 参数的命令中，其中大多数参数都采用了一个包含基元类型值（如整数或字符串）的参数。Of the commands that do use a command parameter, most of these take a parameter with some primitive type value, such as an integer or a string. 但是，可以创建自定义命令，其中该命令需要将 nonprimitive 类型作为其命令参数。However, it is possible to create a custom command where that command expects a nonprimitive type as its command parameter. 对于如下所示的自定义命令用例， 代码中的设置可能需要新的或现有的对象实例。For a custom command case like this, setting in code might require a new or existing object instance. 标记中的设置可能需要属性元素语法，其中填充属性元素语法的对象元素是该命令所需的类型的新元素。Setting in markup might require property element syntax, where the object element filling the property element syntax is a new element of the type expected by that command. 或者，标记中的设置可能需要通过标记扩展对现有对象进行引用 (通常情况下，这些引用是使用 [绑定标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension) 或 [StaticResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension)) 进行的。Alternatively, setting in markup might require a reference through a markup extension to an existing object (typically these references are made with [Binding Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/binding-markup-extension) or [StaticResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension)). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *commandParameter**commandParameter* 与属性中指定的特定命令类型相同的值应为 。A value of the same type as the particular command specified in the property expects. 如果使用现有的命令库命令，请参阅有关使用情况信息的命令库文档 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] ，包括所需的 命令类型。If you use an existing command library command, see that command library's documentation for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, including which type of the command expects. 如果使用自定义命令，请参阅 "备注"。If you use a custom command, see Remarks. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按钮的状态，指示在按钮上按下鼠标左键或空格键。 is the state of a button that indicates the left mouse button or SPACEBAR is pressed over the button. 当 为时 `true` ，控件捕获鼠标。When is `true`, the control captures the mouse. 因此，控件将引发鼠标事件，例如 和 。As a result, the control will raise mouse events such as and . 请注意，使用 或 ENTER 不会更改 或捕获鼠标，但会引发 事件。Note that using the or ENTER does not change or capture the mouse, but is does raise the event. 从 .NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1 开始， 具有受保护的资源库。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, has a protected setter. 若要使用此功能，应用程序应面向 .NET Framework 版本3.5。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 触发器样式中的属性。This example shows how to use the property in a trigger style. summary.span: 为在此控件有焦点的情况下用户按任意键时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现 通过将事件数据的属性设置为时，将事件标记为已处理， `true` 但不会设置为 ，并且以下情况之一为 true：This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when is not set to and one of the following cases are true: - 用户按空格键。The user presses the SPACEBAR. - 用户按 ENTER 键， `true` 此控件为。The user presses ENTER and is `true` for this control. 在所有其他情况下，此实现不会更改 事件数据的属性) 的已处理状态 ( 。In all other cases, this implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果重写 ，请始终在实现中调用基实现 。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 未能调用基实现会阻止基类使用类处理程序来处理事件，这可能会更改最终类的运行时行为。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以在特殊处理之前或之后调用基本实现，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现 通过将事件数据的属性设置为时，将事件标记为 `true` 已处理 。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when is not set to . 若要响应 事件，请将事件处理程序附加到 事件，或将 `handledEventsToo` 设置为时调用 `true` 。To respond to the event, attach an event handler to the event, or call with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`. 当 设置为时 ，此方法将引发 事件。When is set to , this method raises the event.

para.span: 如果重写 ，请始终在实现中调用基实现 。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 未能调用基实现会阻止基类使用类处理程序来处理事件，这可能会更改最终类的运行时行为。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以在特殊处理之前或之后调用基本实现，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
